content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest command, I browsed the website https://www.qalamcenter.com/ to find out what types of Arabic courses Qalam wa Lawh offers. Qalam wa Lawh offers group and private Arabic courses, intensive courses, online courses, and immersion programs. They also offer courses for kids, business Arabic courses, and Arabic teacher training programs. My computer returned an answer from the website stating that Qalam wa Lawh offers fully customizable programs in both Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) and Colloquial Modern Arabic (Darija). The website also includes links to their home, about us, campus, gallery, and news pages.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: International House Madrid offers both face-to-face and online Spanish courses, as well as accommodation options, programmes for groups, and university pathway courses. \n \n Links: ['cookie policy (https://www.ihmadrid.com/en/cookies-policy-international-house-madrid)', '\\n    Accept\\n   (javascript:void(0);)', 'Decline (javascript:void(0);)', 'Manage options (https://www.ihmadrid.com/en/cookies-en.html#cmplz-manage-consent-container)', 'Manage services (https://www.ihmadrid.com/en/cookies-en.html#cmplz-cookies-overview)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.berlitz.com/en-us/language-schools/", "question": "What types of language courses does Berlitz offer?"}}}'}]
"""
